text: Cristien R. Polak (died 26 September 2022) was a Surinamese politician.Gewezen minister Cristien Polak overleden, waterkant.net, 27 September 2022 Polak was in the from 1 February 2017 to 16 May 2019. Together with three other ministers she was replaced in May 2019.Reshuffle kabinet Suriname: namen nieuwe ministers bekend, waterkant.net, 10 May 2019 As a diplomat Polak was at the Surinamese embassy in Caracas. Polak died in hospital in the evenening of 26 September 2022. Desi Bouterse replied to her death with: "A tranga wroko uma has preceded us! Rest in peace Cristien R. Polak and a lot of strength to the family and fellow party members".Oud-minister Cristien Polak heengegaan, srherald.com, 26 September 2022 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Surinamese politicians Category:Diplomats Category:2022 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Cristien Polak
